dct_title_s: Habes hic novam et accuratissimam descriptionem tractus illius Flandriae
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Milliaria Germanica".
North oriented toward bottom of sheet.
Decorative border and cartouche, compass rose, rhumb lines.
Cities in red; forests in green.
Hondius acquired Mercator's atlas plates in 1604, added to them, and re-issued them as the "Mercator-Hondius Atlas" in 1606.
